title: India Ups Energy Clout With Renewables Surge And 40-Plus Oil Suppliers
full_text: India Ups Energy Clout With Renewables Surge And 40-Plus Oil Suppliers. As one of world's largest energy consumers, India is raising its sector clout by creating multibillion dollar opportunities in traditional as well as renewable energy.. Illustration courtesy Getty Creatives. getty One of the worlds largest energy consumers - India - is upping its clout in the sector, and creating multibillion dollar opportunities in both tradition… [+3882 chars]
